mapper.update:
update loan_car_info
car_detail_id = #{carDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
car_detail_name = #{carDetailName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gps_num = #{gpsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_key = #{carKey,jdbcType=TINYINT},
partner_id = #{partnerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
partner_name = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_bank = #{openBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_account = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_month = #{payMonth,jdbcType=TINYINT},
info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
feature = #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_register_date = #{firstRegisterDate,jdbcType=DATE},
business_source = #{businessSource,jdbcType=TINYINT},
cooperation_dealer = #{cooperationDealer,jdbcType=TINYINT},
vehicle_property = #{vehicleProperty,jdbcType=TINYINT},
car_category = #{carCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update loan_car_info set car_detail_id = #{carDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, car_detail_name = #{carDetailName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gps_num = #{gpsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_key = #{carKey,jdbcType=TINYINT}, partner_id = #{partnerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, partner_name = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_bank = #{openBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_account = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_month = #{payMonth,jdbcType=TINYINT}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, feature = #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_register_date = #{firstRegisterDate,jdbcType=DATE}, business_source = #{businessSource,jdbcType=TINYINT}, cooperation_dealer = #{cooperationDealer,jdbcType=TINYINT}, vehicle_property = #{vehicleProperty,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from loan_process_log where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and task_definition_key = '"usertask_commit_key"' order by create_time desc LIMIT 1

SELECT concat( brand.`name`, model.`name` ) AS carName FROM loan_car_info car left join car_detail detail on detail.id = car.car_detail_id LEFT JOIN car_model model ON model.id = detail.model_id LEFT JOIN car_brand brand ON brand.id = model.brand_id WHERE car.id = #{loanCarId}
